UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of truncated alpha-defensin (human neutrophil peptide (HNP)-1) analogues without disulphide bridges.
Literature.Author: Lundy FT, Nelson J, Lockhart D, Greer B, Harriott P, Marley JJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>250µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis NCTC 10400(MIC=>250µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=>250µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans NCTC 10449(MIC=>250µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>250µg/ml),Candida albicans NCTC 3179(MIC=>250µg/ml)
